languages.english-overview:
Logaholic is a powerful web analytics solution that delivers reliable, objective information about the performance of your web site content, traffic, keywords and marketing. Get useful insights that will help you improve your site today.
Logaholic's low impact Javascript tracking tags ensure that collecting data won't slow down your website. If tracking should fail, it does so without delays in load time, invisible to the user.
Logaholic is licensed under their Custom License Agreement.
